content:
er 1, 2016
												This "game" is rather short, only consisting of one track, no way to rebind keys and not even any high scores. HOWEVER, the quality of the VR experience is amazing and I really enjoy running through the level to try and beat my high score. I use an xbox controller and I don't experience any sickness. I really hope the developer can add online high scores and more content down the road. It is cheap, but it is short. If you have VR and like racing games, why not give it a punt.
